title: High Risk of Catastrophic Expenditure for Surgical Care
description: In 2022, 100% of the population in Ivory Coast was at risk of catastrophic expenditure for surgical care, indicating a significant financial burden on citizens seeking medical procedures.

title: High Risk of Impoverishing Expenditure for Surgical Care
description: As of 2022, every individual in Ivory Coast faced a 100% risk of impoverishing expenditure when accessing surgical care, highlighting a critical healthcare affordability issue.

title: Limited Market Competition Services Implementation
description: In 2024, Ivory Coast scored 23.07 in the implementation of key services promoting market competition, suggesting room for improvement in fostering a competitive economic environment.
